extendedInfo.description: Keep your notes and reminders handy on your home screen. Clear Note Widget is an Android sticky notes and notepad app that lets you add a variety of note widgets. Great for shopping and to-do lists, general reminders, and personal quotes. Supports encryption/password-protected notes, sending notes, transparent note widget backgrounds, and multiple widget sizes!Features:- Clear Note Widgets are sticky notes that can be easily pinned to any home screen and edited just by tapping on them- Create regular notepad notes with optional encryption and password-protection for maximum security- Send Note option lets you quickly and easily share your note through Gmail, text message, or your favorite email client- Note widgets are available in multiple sizes: 2x1, 2x2, 3x3, 4x1, 4x2 and 4x4 sizes (each home screen icon takes up 1 space) and resizable in Android 3.1 and above- Fully customize the background style, text color, and font sizes of your note widget- No ads, weird permissions, or spyware of any kind- Quick and easy download: at < 600K, it won't make a dent in your data plan- Free updates and support for life!Keywords: clear note widget, sticky note, post it notes, note widget, notes, notepad, note pad, note, to do list, todo list, shopping list, post it, sticky notes, sticky notes widget, notepad widget, to do widget, post it note

reviews.comment: It does what it says it does.
reviews.author: Jeffery Dodge

reviews.title: Works fine with one caveat.
reviews.comment: The background to the app itself (not the widget) when white makes it difficult to read text that\'s white. It would be nice to be able to change it.
reviews.author: Krishna Rao

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Using this app on sgs3 & nexus 7, it\'s still installed on my old s2, I must like it, I keep coming back for it... :)
reviews.author: Char G

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Does what it says, and does it well!
reviews.author: Steve Pool

reviews.title: Last update deleted all my notes
reviews.comment: I was enjoying this application for quite a while with no problems, but upon the last update all my notes on my  android phone disappeared. Very disappointing. I won\'t continue to use this app unless the developer confirms this won\'t happen again.
reviews.author: Stephanie W.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is really awesome.  I love the idea that I can post it to my home screen and it blends in to my background and you cant really notice it at all!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bryan
reviews.comment: Performs very well on Galaxy Nexus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy app - Perfect for my needs
reviews.comment: I have been very happy with the simplicity of this app and the fact that I can encrypt some notes, apart from a problem I had with an encryped note being lost due to a bug in the system.  However, after contacting the developer with my problem, I was very impressed with the very prompt response and  he immediately worked on a fix for this. Well done.    Lesson learnt for me, though, is that it is a good idea to save anything important to another location, as things can sometimes go wrong.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Really love this app only change would be to allow customized colors and maybe different fonts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great look and functionality
reviews.comment: I use this alongside Simple Calendar and Minimal Reader, and it meshes with the look beautifully. I shopped for an hour and couldn\'t find anything which could match it. I also enjoy the encryption option for if I have to save company data on my phone, but it comes down the great look that is a wonderful find for people looking for a smooth interface.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect for what I wanted to do
reviews.comment: I was looking for a simple sticky note app/widget to put various reminder notes on my home screen, one without a lot of fuss and bother or \"weird permissions,\" and Clear Note is exactly what I wanted.  I really enjoy the transparency of the colored backgrounds, although some of the colors aren\'t truly as described--e.g. \"light yellow\" is anything but that color.  Not docking a star for this, but hopeful that the dev will expand the app to allow for more accurate colors.  Definitely worth the price as it stands.  Runs beautifully on my phone, and the notes are highly visible even with 8 pt. font.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesnt work any more
reviews.comment: I loved this app on my Droid Maxx.  My phone was just updated by Verizon and now app doesn\'t work.  I\'ve uninstall and reinstall a few times.  Now it\'s time yo move on and find something else Even though I\'ve paid for this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AFP
reviews.comment: Uninstalled the app. Will not save non-sticky notes. Wasted too much time trying to get it to work. (Samsung GT i 9000.)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Thanks developer, for not asking for rediculous permissions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Settings
reviews.comment: Works just fine. My only complaint is you can\'t set a default color combo. It\'d be cool to add voice to text option.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: O.D 25/05/2012
reviews.comment: Handy app as my phone didn\'t have any means of taking quick notes. I like the fact you can encrypt a note. No probs encountered yet! SE neo v
